contentrichtext.text: '''Kurt Huang''' is co-founder, president, and chief product officer of [[BitPass]]. He has a [[Computer Science]] degree from [[Harvard]] and an MD from [[Stanford]]. Named to the 2004 list of the world's 100 Top Young Innovators by MIT's Technology Review magazine.<Ref>http://itc.conversationsnetwork.org/shows/detail580.html</ref> He was born in Chicago to immigrants from [[Taiwan]]. ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Huang, Kurt | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Huang, Kurt}} [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:American computer businesspeople]] [[Category:American people of Chinese descent]] [[Category:American people of Taiwanese descent]] [[Category:Harvard University alumni]] [[Category:Stanford University alumni]] [[Category:TR35 winners]] [[Category:Year of birth missing (living people)]] {{US-business-bio-stub}}
